width.description: Fixes the image width, in pixel. If not included in the configuration file, it will be automatically adjusted according to the camera resolution.

height.description: Fixes the image height, in pixel. If not included in the configuration file, it will be automatically adjusted according to the camera resolution.

pixel_size_in_um.description: Size in micrometers of one pixel, when no image distortion is applied. Provide two values if the size if not the same for width and height.

objective.description: If there is a optical magnifier, specify the zooming factor of the objective.

index.description: Index of the camera (as used in OpenCV).

type.description: A Camera from New Imaging Technologies. This camera is only availabe on Linux systems. An internal package (donjon-pynit) is required. This package is not public because contains libraries from NIT

nuc_filepath.description: The file path pointing to the NUC settings of the camera.

bpr_filepath.description: The file path pointing to the BPR settings of the camera.

index.description: Index of the camera (as used in OpenCV).

type.description: A Camera responding to a Rest API.

api_command.description: The command in the Rest API.
